```{r setup}
library(heRomod2)

model <- read_model(system.file("models", "checkimab", package = "heRomod2"))

results <- run_model(model)

```

```r
## Outcomes/Costs

### Outcomes for all strategies, overall population
outcomes_plot_bar(
  results,
  outcome = "qalys"
)

### Outcomes for all strategies, all subgroups
outcomes_plot_bar(
  results,
  outcome = "qalys",
  groups = 'all_groups'
)

### Filter outcomes to a specific strategy
outcomes_plot_bar(
  results,
  outcome = "qalys",
  strategies = 'chemo'
)

### Filter outcomes to a specific set of strategies
outcomes_plot_bar(
  results,
  outcome = "qalys",
  strategies = c('chemo', 'check')
)

```
